attributes.action: Make School end in early June and get rid of the three half term holiday's.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make school end in early june instead of July, and remove the three one-week half term holiday's.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school term dates are a matter for local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find your local council and its school term dates here: https://www.gov.uk/school-term-holiday-dates
